prompts: Create a volcano-inspired Pokemon with a fiery orange body and a rugged appearance.
Imagine a ground-dwelling creature that thrives in desert environments and has a unique lava feature.
Show me a powerful fire-type Pokemon that resembles a giant, sturdy mammal with molten features.
Generate a Pokemon that looks like a fusion of a camel and a volcano with orange and gray colors.
Design a Pokemon with a robust build, featuring distinct volcanic elements and a confident demeanor.
Give me an image of a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of heat and strength, perfect for battle.
Make a Pokemon that showcases a blend of fire and ground types, with a focus on power and endurance.

distinctive_features: Two large volcano-like structures on its back
Round body with a sturdy build
